result.execSummary:
The defendant was charged with both OWI (4th) [Modifiers: Penalty - Operating While under the Influence] and Operating w/ PAC (4th). The defendant was found guilty of OWI (4th) [Modifiers: Penalty - Operating While under the Influence] and the other charge, Operating w/ PAC (4th) was dismissed by the court.

  • Lauren Ann Schmidt was found guilty of OWI (4th) [Modifiers: Penalty - Operating While under the Influence], a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 346.63(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Complete an AODA assessment and follow through with any treatment recommendations.  Ct 2 dismissed.

miscConds.notes: Submit DNA sample.  $65.00 Blood Draw Reimbursement fee.

timeConds.notes:
Huber privileges subject to jail policies.  May transfer to Dane County Jail.  Good time allowed.
Consecutive to: 21CM106.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

chargeModifiers.descr: Penalty - Operating While under the Influence

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Lauren Ann Schmidt

records.addlTxt: for Exemption filed by Atty Amanda Riek
to correct case number that is consecutive to per call from Jail

3:59 PM Defendant Lauren Ann Schmidt in court with Atty Amanda Riek.    Attorney Jordan Lippert in court for State of Wisconsin.21CM106 and 22CM48 and 22TR526R,22TR147 also called.  22CF371 with charge of OWI 4th filed.  22CM48 dismissed without prejudice and refiled as 22CF371 for OWI 4th.  Preliminary hearing waived in 22CF371.  Rights.  Preliminary hearing waived, court accepted and found probable cause existed.  Bound over for future proceedings.  Information filed.  Reading waived.  Rights/elements.  In 21CM106, defendant plead no contest to  Ct 1 OWRCS 3rd.  Court accepted plea, adjudged guilty, JOC entered. Sentencing statements.   Court withheld sentence and placed on 24 months probation.  Conditions:  45 days jail with huber.  May transfer to Dane County.   Fine $1870.00.  $65.00 Blood Draw reimbursement fee.  Maintain absolute sobriety.  AODA and comply.  26 month revocation/26 month IID/  DNA sample.  Dismiss Ct 2 and Ct 3.  In 22CF371, defendant plead no contest to OWI 4th.  Court accepted plea, adjudged guilty, JOC entered.  Court withheld sentence, placed on 24 month probation.  Conditions:  $2323 fine.  135 days jail with huber consecutive to 21CM106. May transfer to Dane County.  $65.00 Blood Draw Reimbursement Fee.  Maintain absolute sobriety .  AODA.  36 month revocation/36 month IID.  Submit DNA sample. Ct 2 dismissed and   Dismiss refusal 22TR526R and 22TR1147.    Jail credit:  1 day in 21CM106.  4 days in 22CF371. Apply bond $500 from 22CM48 to 22CF371.  Jail to commence 7-6-22 @ 7 pm.  Atty Riek will file Petition for Exemption.  Court informed IID must be installed in a different vehicle before order would be signed.  Good time allowed.  4:40pm recess
